title: ADip-pADi aruLai nADi
sahitya:
ADip-pADi aruLai nADi anbu sheiguvOm vArIr


anupallavi

  kUDi uLLak-kUTTuravinAl kuvalayam podu valayamAga


caraNam    vAzhvu malarum kaniyum kulungum vasantak-kalaiyAi viLanga magizhvOm
vaLarum iLamai inba nalangaL vaLam perugat-tigazhvOm Azhvinai pera Uzhvinaiyara
amarAnanda yOgam payinrE ariya rasikapriyarAgi Avi deiva kAviyamAga
